price: (Allah) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ubusabe bwanyu mwembi (Musa na Haruna) bwakiriwe. Bityo, nimushikame ku nzira igororotse kandi ntimuzigere mukurikira na rimwe inzira y’abadafite ubumenyi.”
arabic: قَالَ قَدۡ أُجِيبَت دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَٱسۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla qad ujībat daʿwatukumā fa-is'taqīmā walā tattabiʿānni sabīla alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
translations: So you two (keep to the) straight way
